data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,573,299 who are far from you in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Faqir people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Faqir people.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 51,498 believers living in the county of Ghaziabad. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 51,498 believers in the county of Ghaziabad.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Ghaziabad.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
